lead_paragraph: China will carry out social stability risk assessments before approving major projects for the 2022 Winter Olympics, a senior official wrote on Monday, pledging an open and transparent program of construction.

headline.print_headline: China to Weigh Social Stability Risk for Winter Games Projects
headline.main: China to Weigh Social Stability Risk for Winter Games Projects
